message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $180. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
Hi Alice, $180 is a bit high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I'm only willing to pay $100.  Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $180 represents my initial asking price, I'm willing to come down to $150. I believe this price point reflects the true value of the product.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down to $150, but I'm still not there yet. I'm willing to pay $125.  That's my final offer.
